HT_Text_BOS_Monster_DR_Exp.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The higher the defence rating of your monster, the more punishment it can take during battle.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_BOS_Monster_AR_Exp.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>The higher the attack rating of your monster, the more damage it can inflict on opponents.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_BOS_Monster_Health_Exp.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>This is your monster's health. If your monster loses all of its health, you will no longer be able to release a monster of that type - until you capture another one of course!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_BOS_Monster_NoMoves.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>You currently have no moves that you can select.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>

HT_Text_BOS_Monster_NoMonsters.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_BOSStd>You currently have no monsters.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_BOSStd>
